title: Space Colonization
description: In this coding challenge, I'm using the space colonization algorithm to make a tree generator. This is the 4th part of my algorithmic botany series.

timestamps.title: Create a branch object that has a position and a parent
Add the root of the tree
Add a direction to the branch
Add a function to add the next branch
Add a grow function to determine the closest branch to each leaf
"Pull" the direction of closest branch toward the leaf
Add a count variable to the Branch variable
Loop backwards through the leaf array to delete leaves that were reached
Determine whether a branch was attracted to a leaf
Add a default length to the branches
